name: new-hire-test
description: - Setup a database / data store to house the json data provided (labels, artists, releases)  - Using a data processing implementation, remove any existing duplicates before inserting them into your data repository. - Create a POST route that validates and saves incoming data  - Create a GET route that can retrieve and return artist release data based on the following parameters:     - Return all artist data     - Return a single artist by name or ID     - Return multiple artists by names or ID's     - Filter by "album" or "single"     - Filter by label id     - Filter by UPC
